body:
As energy resistance, except it absorbs the first 20 points of energy damage per attack.

Moderate abjuration; CL 7th; Craft Magic Arms and Armor, resist energy; Price +42,000 gp.
name: Energy Resistance, Improved
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Armor/Magic Armor and Shield Special Ability Descriptions/Energy Resistance/Improved
